title: 50 Cent and Chris Pratt Expose Fake Wokeness in Hollywood
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
This week Andrew, Akaash, AlexxMedia, and Mark discuss the fake wokeness in Hollywood in regards to Chris Pratt, 50 Cent voting for Trump, JLo calling herself Black, ex-CNN's Jeffrey Toobin exposing himself on Zoom, why we feel more comfortable as outsiders, and much more. INDULGE!

Want to increase your performance and get that extra confidence in bed? Go to BlewChew.com and use the promo code ANDREW to get your first shipment FREE. Just pay $5 shipping

Want an extra episode a week? Join the Flagrant Army
www.Patreon.com/FLAGRANT2

Flagrant 2 is a comedy podcast that delivers unfiltered, unapologetic, and unruly hot takes directly to your dome piece. In an era dictated by political correctness, hosts Andrew Schulz and Akaash Singh, along with AlexxMedia and Mark Gagnon, could care less about sensitivities. If it’s funny and flagrant it flies. If you are sensitive this podcast is not for you. But if you miss the days of comedians actually being funny instead of preaching to a choir then welcome to The Flagrancy.
